标题: [辰逝の搬运]Maahkay Vacation Island 度假岛 本帖最后由 辰逝年华 于 2016-8-22 17:38 编辑 
Maahkay Vacation Isand
                                           ——by qouiloan
[book]地图の介绍[book]
Maahkay曾经是一个非常美丽的岛屿
很多人在那里度假 但是有一天末日降临了
人们犹豫着试图离开 但疾病迅速地传播

[painting]游戏の截图[painting]
 
















[map]存档の安装[map]

save存档：关闭Minecraft，在Windows开始菜单的搜索框输入%appdate%/.minecraft,然后按下Enter（回车）把从百度网盘下载回来的地图存档解压放到.minecraft\saves文件夹里面

作者の留言这张地图花费了我们170+小时的心血和汗水希望大家能够喜欢

replies.author: PETER·篠
replies.txt_content:
What is Maahkay? 
Maahkay is what remains of what was once an beautiful island resort/getaway 
for the middle class citizen. All of that that goes down the drain when the ever 
impending doom on the apocalypse is heavy on the shoulders of the people 
vacationing there. Hesitant, people attempt to leave but the disease strikes to quickly. 
Dooming all the inhabitants turning them into the undead. Some would argue that 
the island is more beautiful than it was when it was still inhabited by the living because 
of the overgrowth of greenery. 

Gameplay 
Explore the overgrown structures taken back by nature, Take a long stroll down the 
grassy asphalt streets and climb to the tallest points to experience the island from the sky. 

Man Hours 
This map took more than 170+ hours to build and terraform. Blood sweat and tears went into this map 
and I really hope you enjoy it. It took me longer than I hoped it would take to finish this map but it's finally 
finished and I'm super pleased with where it's at. 

Crafting Dead WIP 

This map was built in 1.7.10 - 1.8 so it's now being changed to the current version of Crafting dead Cure.

请对原作者的话进行完整翻译。
